response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously crafted to exceed expectations and deliver unparalleled value. This exceptional item, while priceless to us due to its unique features and the dedication of our team, is offered to you at a special price of $500,000. We believe this offers an outstanding opportunity for you to acquire something truly remarkable at a fraction of its inherent worth.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, feel free to reach out to me directly. I am more than happy to provide you with detailed specifications, testimonials from satisfied customers, or any other materials that might help you make an informed decision.

I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this exclusive offer.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 500000}
